summary: Enchanting in Stores is a simple mod that adds enchanting tables to general stores and fences. This way you can disenchant and sell your items in the same store!
descriptionHtml:
Enchanting in Stores

Are your tired of running to your house every time you want to sell an enchanted item just because you forgot which enchantments you already know? If so then run no more because this mod will solve your problem!
Enchanting in Stores is a simple mod that adds enchanting tables to general stores and fences. This way you can disenchant and sell your items in the same store!
Also if you have a favourite store that hasn’t been ‘enchantified’ just leave a comment with the name of the store and I shall see to it that it gets an enchanting table.

Features:
Adds enchanting tables in the following stores:

- Niranye’s House				(Fence)
-Sadri’s Used Wars				(General)
-Gray Pine Goods	 				(General)
-The Winking Skeever				(Fence)
-Bits and Pieces	 				(General)
-Endon’s House	 				(Fence)
-Arnleif and Sons Trading Company		(General)
-Pawned Prawn					(General)
-Ragged Flagon					(Fence)*
-Riverwood Trader				(General)
-Belethor’s General Goods			(General)
-Honningbrew Meadery			(Fence)

*Pops in after you’ve taken over two cities by completing jobs with delvin and vex. It appears along with the mage to keep it lorefriendly

Note: I know that technically Entir is a fence too but adding another enchanting table to the college of winterhold is a bit unnecessary.

Installation:
-Download with NMM and activate

Manual installation (not recommended):
-Extract file
-Place the esp in the ...\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder

Steam Workshop:
For those of you who insist on using the workshop here is the link:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11729

Load Order:
-Load this mod somewhere near the top for instance where you load other house mods

Future Plans:
This mod is considered final but if you have any tips or suggestions please let me know and i might add it to this mod.

Uninstallation:
-Deactivate using NMM
-When using the manual installation remove the StoreEnchanting.esp from your data folder

Incompatibility:
Might cause some clipping issues with mods that alter the same space but it won’t break your game or anything.

~Thanks for downloading, hope you enjoy the mod~
author: MrK44s
